metadata.description: The normal box is the best companion for the Trainer! It holds all the necessary items to train 1 to 3 Kryptopets
metadata.name: Normal Box

attributes.description: Potion: Potions are used to cure Kryptopets by providing the necessary elements to gain Health Points, Intelligence Points, or Constitution Points.

Potion: Potions are used to cure Kryptopets by providing the necessary elements to gain Health Points, Intelligence Points, or Constitution Points.
Revive: In the event your Kryptopet suffer devastating damages during a Combat Training or is left unattended for too long and dies, you can use a Revive to get it back to full health.
